data.message: I am looking for a job I am veteran with two tour oversea, who wants to work for facebook as as a desktop support, or technical support, I don't have a degree but experience in the IT field and I build up my skill since I was a kid. I have been struggling with life I manage to get a job with amazon as a picker but its not my passion, my passion is computers and technology cause its my stronger skill set. I am trying to get back on my feet and pay all this debt that I have that destroyed me. I am living in a veterans transition home cause I could not afford housing. I lost my previous job due to cut hours or funding issue which was an IT job.

replies.message: Thank you for your service to our country, Andycel. You can learn more about working for Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2e9NRF7. -Rhea
Hey, Fidan. For questions about ads or Pages, please reach out to our business team here: http://bit.ly/2dXoECr. Thanks! -Rhea
